summary: Updates the changes from SkyRe into the CCO character creation screen.
descriptionHtml:
Updates the changes from [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/9286/?]Skyrim Redone[/url] into the [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/21587/?tab=1&navtag=%2Fajax%2Fmoddescription%2F%3Fid%3D21587%26preview%3D&pUp=1]Character Creation Overhaul[/url] character creation screen.  These include the standing stone changes and the change from lockpick/pickpocket into wayfarer/fingersmith.  

Also changes the race desciptions to show the abilities they start with.  

Only use this if you are using the 2 mods above and the races and standing stones modules from SkyRe.

Load this after them.
author: CT
